    • joinGame

      private void joinGame(Scanner userInput) throws RemoteException, InterruptedException
      this method is used to join the game on the server, it asks the client for a nickname and the tries to join the lobby if the game has not started, if the game has already started then it asks the client the nickname so he can try to reconnect to the game
      Parameters:
      userInput - the scanner on which the client input data
      Throws:
      RemoteException
      InterruptedException

      private int checkedInputForIntValues(Scanner scanner, int min, int max, String ErrorMessage)
      this method is used to check int values that the user input so that he does not insert problematic values
      Parameters:
      scanner - input scanner on which the player input data
      min - minimum int value
      max - maximum int value
      ErrorMessage - error message to print if the player type a wrong value
      Returns:

    • checkForCommand

      private boolean checkForCommand(String userInput) throws IOException
      this method is used to check if the input of the client contains a command to send to the server
      Parameters:
      userInput - string typed by the client
      Returns:
      true if the string contained a command, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException
